attributes.action: Legislate, so that when criminals are sentenced to a term in prison, they serve that FULL TERM IN PRISON!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If someone is sentenced to imprisonment, why is it that they are released early? There are thousands of cases, where criminals are sentenced to a term of 7 years and are out on so called parol after just half the term. Why not just sentence them to 3 years in the first place! SERVE THE TIME SENTENCED!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
